state: Who's got a virtual machine and is about to play through an life changing round of TextWorld? You do! First step, make an attempt to go west. If you can succeed at that, take a trip north. And then, travel east. Then, venture east. Okay, and then, attempt to travel east. Following that, make an attempt to venture north. And then, go west. That done, venture south. Next, try to head east. With that accomplished, travel east. Then, move south. And then, attempt to go west. Next, move west. With that done, travel west. Then, recover the coin from the floor of the canteen. Alright, thanks! -= Studio =- Well, here we are in the studio. You can barely contain your excitement. There is an unguarded exit to the west. > -= Studio =-0/1
